name: MISSION FOR VISION
briefDescription: Established in the year 2000, MFV is a not-for-profit organisation registered under the Bombay Public Trust Act (1950) for the eradication of avoidable blindness through the enablement of high quality and comprehensive eye services in the eye care sector. 80% of blindness is avoidable if people get the right treatment on time.KEYWORDS: eyesight, eye care, eye health, cataract, cataract surgery, school eye health, glasses, spectacles, eye, eyes, retina, refraction, community eye health, infrastructure support, quality of care, PRISM
